region.label: Region
region.description: Specify the region of the Amazon Athena data source

s3_bucket_location.label: Amazon S3 bucket location
s3_bucket_location.description: Specify the location of the S3 bucket where query results will be stored

vpcflow_database_name.label: VPC Flow Logs database name
vpcflow_database_name.description: Specify the name of the database containing the VPC Flow Logs

vpcflow_table_name.label: VPC Flow Logs table name
vpcflow_table_name.description: Specify the name of the table containing the VPC Flow Logs

ocsf_database_name.label: OCSF Logs database name
ocsf_database_name.description: Specify the name of the database containing the OCSF Logs

ocsf_table_name.label: OCSF Logs table name
ocsf_table_name.description: Specify the name of the table containing the OCSF Logs

guardduty_database_name.label: Amazon GuardDuty database name
guardduty_database_name.description: Specify the name of the database containing the Amazon GuardDuty logs

guardduty_table_name.label: Amazon GuardDuty table name
guardduty_table_name.description: Specify the name of the table containing the Amazon GuardDuty logs

aws_access_key_id.label: AWS access key ID
aws_access_key_id.description: AWS Access Key ID is required for both AWS key-based and role-based authentication

aws_iam_role.label: AWS IAM role
aws_iam_role.description: AWS IAM Role is required for only AWS role-based authentication

aws_assume_role_external_id.label: External ID for AWS assume role
aws_assume_role_external_id.description: External ID is optional for using in AWS role-based authentication

aws_secret_access_key.label: AWS secret access key
aws_secret_access_key.description: AWS Secret Access Key ID is required for both AWS key-based and role-based authentication
